sentences: Selle kehaga saab pildida vaid kogu kõrgeima asjakohasusega spetsialistide meeskond.
Kui mäss oli hukkunud, tekib tema kehal ilmselt veri.
context: The word 'kere' in Estonian translates to English as 'body'. It is used to refer to a person's physical body. In example sentences, it appears in contexts such as describing the movement of the body, the condition requiring expert care, and situations involving blood on the body after an injury.
